root.name: Three Weeks in Paradise
root.description: An action adventure game that has the hero Wally Weeks trying to rescue his wife and daughter from the hostile natives of the island they are on (the Can Nibbles). Wally must use a variety of objects in order to solve puzzles and free his kind and subsequently escape the island.

similar_games.game: Everyone's A Wally: A Day in the Life of Wally
